Articles.Content: I'm excited for procedural wings.
@MATVEICH_YTI wonder what mods you can create

I enjoy the flight portion of KSP, and the procedural wings are going to be a gamechanger. 

I do wonder how multi-segment wings will work, and if I could ever get a proper ogive, but they're just new challenges I can't wait to tackle.

me want

 

 

me excited for colonies and bases
I'm excited for doing rocket engineering again in a fresh new game!
Can't wait to see how the devs try to improve and iterate over KSP 1, gonna be fun I feel
I'm excited for the terrain. From orbit and on the map, planets look boring, but from what we've seen with the Mun and Duna, It's had a major improvement

In addition to rockets and spaceplanes, We will now be able to construct entire colonies. By flying colony modules to other planets, we will be able to create habitats that can support a small population of Kerbals. This is what Iam most excited for because This can bring a change  to the game immensely which can create a bigger fan base.
Super excited to build colonies and build giant interstellar ships!

I have been excited for KSP 2 since it was announced. Personally, the most exciting thing to me is the new building system. I think that it will be amazing to create any wing shape you want! All I know is im going to be spending hours if not days in the VAB just designing and building either replicas or original spacecraft, rovers, orbital stations and interstellar ships when interstellar travel is perfected and added!
Simply joyous news
I am extremely excited to see how the new tools (tutorials, delta-v info) can help new and existing players as well as seeing how this game can inspire the next generation of explorers.
I am excited to be a part of the development & ultimately, the future of KSP 2. I'm looking forward to working with the developers to create this interstellar masterpiece!
I'm excited for multiplayer to sabotage play along with my friends.
I am excited for the new procedural wings and the new tanks which have made making sstos much more interesting
Mods!

Finally, my beloved game got continue!
I very excited for Multiplayer, and Interstellar!
Even if i win, i still gonna buy 1 more copy!)
Looking forward to the improved UI!

9 hours ago, Dman979 said:



Hey everyone!
To celebrate the release of Kerbal Space Program 2 Early Access, we are having a giveaway: Three copies of Kerbal Space Program 2 are up for grabs to members of this forum!


To enter, simply comment in this thread with something that you're excited for! (Only one entry will be counted per person. The purpose of this thread is as a giveaway and to share what you are excited for; off-topic complaints or comments about KSP2 should be posted in the appropriate forum location.)
Giveaway ends at 6PM PT Thursday! Countdown is here! The prizes will be given to the winners on launch day.
Good luck!

After thousands of hours flying I'm excited for multiplayer sharing the experience with friends
I'm excited for it being a new stable platform which hopefully has less spaghetti code than KSP 1, and thus less random crashes/lag/glitches

Personally super excited about the painting and proc wings

Both of those look so fun to play around with
I am extremely excited for vapor cones.
I am excited for the paint job of the parts. Looking good is more important than looking where you go.
I’m excited for new nuclear ☢️ engines (and generators), as well as for colonies and resources!
I'm really excited for Interstellar Travel and the new UI (It looks great:)).
